# Anniversary Scrollytelling Project

This is a Node.js-based scrollytelling web application for anniversary celebrations.

## Project Structure
- `server.js` - Express server with API endpoints
- `public/` - Static frontend files
- `public/index.html` - Main HTML template
- `public/styles/main.css` - Responsive CSS with animations
- `public/js/main.js` - Main application logic
- `public/js/scroll-animations.js` - Scroll animation handlers

## Key Features
- Interactive scrollytelling with smooth animations
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile
- RESTful API for content management
- Touch/swipe navigation support
- Progress indicators and navigation dots

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern JavaScript (ES6+) features
- Follow responsive design principles
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Optimize for performance and accessibility
- Follow RESTful API conventions

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Node.js + Express.js
- Frontend: Vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Styling: CSS Grid, Flexbox, CSS Animations
